courseDescription:
Acquire knowledge of business models for small businesses through this interactive course in which you will learn how to build a profitable small business from the ground up on a limited budget. This knowledge will help you master all the tactics, strategies and little secrets you need to build and run your small business like a profitable and efficient machine. The course begins by setting up the proper foundations of your small business, starting from finding the right customers and defining their wants, needs and limitations. Next, you will explore the different markets to find a profitable market gap, identify the customer's requirements and then develop a competitive unique selling proposition (USP) that satisfies their wants and fulfils their needs. In addition, you will familiarise yourself with how to position your business and products for value and premium customers. Finally, become proficient in delivering personalised and unique customer experiences instead of competing at a low price and losing money.

This exciting course will teach you to work with different suppliers, including print-on-demand, drop-shipping and white labels. You will gain practical knowledge and real-life insights into the benefits and disadvantages of each supplier and which works best for your business to run efficiently and generate more profit. Grasp the steps to create and produce the product and analyse the costs associated with making it, including materials and labour costs. Become proficient in operating your small business effectively and profitably, taking control over your business costs and understanding and breaking down your operating expenses. In addition, this course will highlight the importance of knowing the ins and outs of rearranging and optimising your business process for ultimate profitability. As a result, this valuable information will enhance your ability to make better decisions to improve your business.

This program will undoubtedly guide you through scaling and widening your business marketing and distribution channels. It will lead you through the steps and processes you need to market and sell your product without prior experience or highly technical skills. We provide many examples that show you how to build profitable marketing funnels. These illustrations will show you how to attract new customers, up-sell and cross-sell to existing customers and sell items at a higher cost increasing your income. At the end of the course, you will master the process of leveraging different bullet-proven, profitable business models to diversify your income streams and generate more money for your business. We will equip you with all the strategies, tools, tactics and experience you will ever need to build a profitable small business on a low budget. Suppose you want to become a strategic entrepreneur or a thriving business owner. In that case, wait no more and enrol in this ultimate guide to building a profitable and scalable small business.
